Text: downloaded it and the game says that i have to upgrade to version 3.60???? plz help
I have the same problem as Dan has. Please help!

For those prople who installed crack and patch and replaced PARAM.SFO but still getting the 'Update to 3.60' error, this is how you fix it.

>open file manager and multiman and go to hdd0/game and delete BLUS30762
>exit multiman.. reinstall PATCH then crack (it is important to install PATCH first)
> then install CRACK
>(if you havent change the PARAM.SFO, do it now or you can let multiman change it for you but i recommend manual replacement)
> launch the game using multiman and kill people :D
